site_meta_data.title: Daniel's blog - Daniel's coding journey
site_meta_data.author: Daniel Wong
site_meta_data.description: Daniel's coding journey - work and life stories through the keyboard of an open-minded Software Engineer

name: Daniel Wong
bio_1: I'm aliased as Daniel at work.
bio_2: I'm a learner, builder, and freedom seeker.
bio_4: I was born in Heyuan, a small city in Guangdong.
bio_5: My first programming language I learned was Pascal.
bio_7: I'm focusing on building eCommerce software.
bio_8: I work mostly with Golang/TS technologies.
bio_13: I love playing video games, NBA2K is my favorite one.
bio_start_coding: I started learning to code in 2018 and have been hooked ever since.
bio_first_job: I landed my first job as a Software Engineer in 2020.
bio_passion: I have a passion for Golang/TS, web dev, and eCommerce.
bio_blog_purpose: I started this blog to document and share my knowledge & experience.
lost_message: Hmm.. it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.

blog.intro: I write mostly about web development, tech related, and sometime about my personal life. Use the search below to filter by title.

about_description: More about me and this blog
resume_description: My professional career, experiences, and skills.

projects.projects_description: My open-source side projects and stuff that I built with my colleagues at work
